title: audio meta extractor related issues on older debian . need mutagen >= 1.36
body:
#### What is the problem?
```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_audio.test_audio
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.0~rc5+git5-gc83774cd/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 587, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.0~rc5+git5-gc83774cd/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/metadata/extractors/tests/test_audio.py", line 61, in test_audio
    eq_(meta[k], v)
AssertionError: 1.045 != 1.0

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.metadata.tests.test_search.test_within_ds_file_search
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.0~rc5+git5-gc83774cd/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 587, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.0~rc5+git5-gc83774cd/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/metadata/tests/test_search.py", line 238, in test_within_ds_file_search
    assert_in(target_out, cmo.out)
AssertionError: 'audio.bitrate
audio.duration(s)
audio.format
audio.music-Genre
audio.music-album
audio.music-artist
audio.music-channels
audio.music-sample_rate
audio.name
audio.tracknumber
datalad_core.id
datalad_core.refcommit
id
parentds
path
type
' not found in 'audio.bitrate
audio.duration(s)
audio.format
audio.music-Genre
audio.music-album
audio.music-artist
audio.music-sample_rate
audio.name
audio.tracknumber
datalad_core.id
datalad_core.refcommit
id
parentds
path
type
'

```
that is with jessie/main python-mutagen all 1.25.1-1 

in the second failure "audio.music-channels" seems to be missing (may be something else as well -- just eyeballed).  on nd90 it is already 1.36-1  so I guess we might want to demand higher version of it than
